mapper.update: update movie set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actors = #{actors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, poster = #{poster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, release_time = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, actors, title, poster, release_time from movie
